name: Slow Cooker Cheesy Potatoes
author: Renee
summary: An easy tasty recipe for cheesy potatoes.  Great for potlucks or the holidays when oven space is limited!  It can easily be doubled if you have a larger slow cooker.
ingredients: 1 (32 ounce) package frozen Southern-style hash brown potatoes
2 (10.75 ounce) cans  condensed Cheddar cheese soup
1 (2.8 ounce) can French fried onions, divided
directions: Grease your slow cooker with cooking spray or shortening
In a large bowl, stir together the hash browns, cheese soup, evaporated milk, and half of the French fried onions
Cover, and cook on High for 4 hours, or Low for 8 hours
Top with remaining onions just before serving
